name: Cool Shooter
description:
Top down shooter with 90's theme.

Kill enemies to pick up their debris, but if you get hit you lose 10%, so watch out!

Right click to cycle 3 weapons:

  • The Minigun fires extra bullets when you pick up debris.
  • The Shotgun can deflect enemy bullets.
  • The Sniper attracts debris toward you.

The Cheat version features 2 hotkeys:

"P" will grant 500 points.

"B" will spawn a boss.
